name: Color Theory (starschumi)
description:
Main Page

- The game is a semi-roughlike where you need to match your color with a key that is a color which if you mix together make the color of the door. Get your color theory practice. What colors do you need to match in order to open the doors?

Post Mortem

- Successes: In the end, all the code worked as planned and everything was exported with ease.

- Setbacks: Having lost practice with Unity made it hard to go back in and make everything while rusty.

- Lessons Learned: Practice makes perfect and I feel like I've thrown my rust away.

- Next Steps: I would make smarter enemies and more rooms. Looking even more into the future, I would make the rooms generate themselves.
